name: Buff CoolNet UV+ Multifunctional Headband - Unisex
description:
Narrower than a neck tube, wider than a headband, this multifunctional piece offers a variety of wearing options. The moisture managing fabric keeps sweat out of your eyes on trail runs or hot bike rides, and the antimicrobial treatment means it won't start smelling funky on long hikes.CoolNet® fabric has sweat activated cooling to keep your head from overheating.UPF 50+ sun protection blocks 98% of UV rays.HeiQ Smart Temp antimicrobial treatment resists odour buildup.

        Sustainability
